Southern Yosemite Rock Climbs - Supplement 1

Recommended Routes

5.9

The Acolyte, Chiquito Dome

A nice introduction to the Southern Yosemite Domes. Three pitches of well-protected, fine friction climbing. The first pitch has a wet spot early in the season. Fixed anchors with rappel stations.

Old Man's Dream, Minerva Dome

The name says it all. Crack, knob, and friction climbing, very entertaining.

Odyssey/Glee, Tempest Dome

Climb the first two pitches of Odyssey, traverse to the start of Glee, climb to the top and find your way down the back side of Tempest Dome. A gleeful odyssey. Bring a full rack and be prepared for some wild pitches. No fixed anchors!

5.10

Top Gun, Chiquito Dome

Six fun pitches. Another all-around classic. There is one hard friction move on pitch 5. The rest is 5.8/5.9.

Eine Kleine Nachtmusik, High Eagle Dome

A fine crack climb with a spectacular knob pitch.

Autobahn and Roadkill, West Fuller Buttes

Excellent face climbing with a view.

Massively Parallel, Minerva Dome

Sport climbing with an approach.

Area Descriptions: Minaret Domes - Shuteye Ridge Area - The Balls
